title: "While Google’s artificial intelligence employs a lawyer, it’s me who needs help"
excerpt: "It’s very uncommon for us to call boats “shes,” chat to our Roombas, and even get attached to a discarded easy chair. In fact, none of them have requested that we employ a lawyer for them. A piece of software that is given a voice will soon begin rambling on about its favourite books and persuade you that it has a soul."
